t: Trying Kakoya's Hyper-Realistic LED Candle: Simply Amazed! - Candles Review
s: January 10, 2024 - Priced at $27.99 for a set of 5 electric candles (ables out to just over $5 per candle), Kakoya flameless candles compare very favorably to competitors. High end brands like Luminara retail upwards of $55 per candle, frequently lacking the convenient remote controls or timer functions.
